original_text: Then she speaks to all her friends and to those that live near to her. She says to them, “I have found the coin that I lost. So come to my house and we can all be happy together.”
korean_text: 또 찾아낸즉 벗과 이웃을 불러 모으고 말하되 나와 함께 즐기자 잃은 드라크마를 찾아내었노라 하리라

sentences.original_text: Then she speaks to all her friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 자기 모든 친구들에게 말합니다

sentences.original_text: and to those that live near to her
and we can all be happy together
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 모두 함께 기뻐할 수 있어요
